item.description:
Come have fun and do some short form silly games with us! No experience required! Just show up and I guarantee you'll have a great time. No pressure, just laughs and support! :) If you've ever seen Whose Line Is It Anyway? and thought "I want to try that" well now is your chance.

If there are any games you want to try just let me know and we'll do them!

$2 - $3 donation requested to help cover room rental fees and website maintenance costs

Feel free to message me with any comments/concerns/suggestions/silly thoughts...
item.how_to_find_us: probably will be in the small room directly to your LEFT when you enter the building, look for the Improv Incubator sign
item.name: Stop, Collaborate and Listen! Incubator is back with a brand new edition!
